com.monitor.model

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.monitor.interfaces.ServiceListener
      • com.monitor.model.Client

  • public class Client
extends ServiceListener
    This class implements Client/caller of the monitoring service. Client specifies pollingInterval at what frequency he wants to poll a service and service outage a time window during which client doesn't want notifications. The client extends ServiceListener which provides a notification method if there is any message for client.
    Author:
    akshayhiremath

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private int id
        Id to identify the client. At the moment, this id doesn't hold any significance other than distinguishing messages from client. Id will be set by service when the client will be registered to get service status

      • pollingInterval

        private int pollingInterval
        interval deciding polling frequency

      • serviceOutage

        private OutageWindow serviceOutage
        Service outage window within which client doesnt want notification

        Constructs client with service it has subscribed to
        Parameters:
        service -

      • Client

        public Client(Service service,
              int pollingInterval,
              OutageWindow serviceOutage)
        Constructs Client with given polling interval and service outage window And also binds the service to the service passed
        Parameters:
        service - service to which this client wants to listen
        pollingInterval - polling interval preferred by this client
        serviceOutage - service outage window within which client doesnt want notification
